name: Deep Cold Waters
objectives: Investigate the signal's origins in the deep cold waters.
challenges: In this hostile environment, the player must avoid detection by the swarms of entities. They must counter and use abilities to avoid or defend themselves.

enemies.name: Cyber Marine Swarm
enemies.description: Shoaling and schooling of cyber marine life that act like an underwater swarm, attacking anything foreign.

enemies.name: Robotic Cephalopod
enemies.description: An intelligent and aggressive robotic cephalopod that releases slick oils to trap people, then engulfs and encases them with their tentacles to create a vacuum to ignite the organism ablaze, electrocute them, or poison them.

rewards.name: Quantum Electromagnetic Emitter
rewards.description: A quantum communication and quantum sensing add-on. They are installed to amplify the electromagnetic environment to increase their emission rate.

rewards.name: Signal Artifact
rewards.description: The artifact that was emitting the signal, which turned out to be a cyberdeck of sorts.

name: Decoding the Signal
objectives: Player has obtained the device that was sending out and emitting the signal. They must now decode the signal.
challenges: Players must connect to the device and undo and hack any protection that is not allowing them to access the Artifact.

enemies.name: Intelligent Autonomous Firewall
enemies.description: An iron-clad firewall that prevents any hacking or driver mounting of the artifact. It exists in the latent space, which acts like an in-between space.

rewards.name: Artifact Knowledge
rewards.description: Access to the knowledge contained within the Artifact.

name: Infiltrating the Metropolis
objectives: Enter the stronghold metropolis and navigate its treacherous layers to gather information and resources.
challenges: The player must blend in with the various biomorphs and avoid drawing attention to themselves. They need to gather information and access restricted areas without being detected.

enemies.name: Latent Sentinels
enemies.description: Holographic security entities that patrol the latent space, seeking out intruders and anomalies.

enemies.name: Corrupted Cyborgs
enemies.description: Once-human cyborgs who have been hijacked by the city's hidden layer, now serving as its enforcers.

rewards.name: Metropolis Map
rewards.description: A detailed map of the metropolis, revealing key locations and hidden passages.

rewards.name: Biomorph Disguise
rewards.description: A modular disguise that allows the player to mimic different biomorphs and blend in seamlessly.

name: The Device
objectives: Analyze the recovered device and extract the vital information it contains.
challenges: The player must navigate through the device's security measures, including encryption, traps, and defensive mechanisms. They need to retrieve the data while ensuring its integrity.

enemies.name: Device Guardians
enemies.description: Advanced security protocols and AI defenders built into the device to protect its secrets.

enemies.name: Data Corruptors
enemies.description: Malicious software entities that seek to corrupt and destroy the device's data.

rewards.name: Atmospheric Regeneration Plans
rewards.description: Detailed schematics and instructions for rebuilding Earth's atmosphere.

rewards.name: Device Upgrade
rewards.description: An enhancement for the player's own devices, granting improved hacking and data manipulation capabilities.

name: Confronting the Opposition
objectives: Face the groups who seek to destroy the atmospheric regeneration knowledge and uncover their motives.
challenges: The player must navigate complex political alliances and engage in strategic negotiations or combat with opposing factions. They need to gather evidence and expose the corruption.

enemies.name: Faction Agents
enemies.description: Skilled operatives from various factions who aim to eliminate the player and seize the knowledge for themselves.

enemies.name: Swarm Infestations
enemies.description: Outbreaks of hostile swarms that have been unleashed by the opposing groups to hinder the player's progress.

rewards.name: Faction Dossiers
rewards.description: Detailed information on the opposing factions, their leaders, and their weaknesses.

rewards.name: Advanced Weaponry
rewards.description: Cutting-edge weapons and defensive systems that give the player an edge in combat.

name: Race Against Time
objectives: Implement the atmospheric regeneration plans before the exodus from Earth reaches a critical point.
challenges: The player must navigate through the chaos of the accelerating exodus, overcoming obstacles and sabotage attempts. They need to gather resources and allies to execute the plan.

enemies.name: Exodus Extremists
enemies.description: Radical factions who believe in abandoning Earth and will stop at nothing to prevent the player from succeeding.

enemies.name: Saboteur Droids
enemies.description: Reprogrammed droid bots that have been tasked with disrupting the atmospheric regeneration efforts.

rewards.name: Regeneration Catalyst
rewards.description: A crucial component needed to initiate the atmospheric regeneration process.

rewards.name: Exodus Schematic
rewards.description: Detailed plans for a spacecraft capable of interstellar travel, providing a backup plan if Earth cannot be saved.

name: The Final Stand
objectives: Defend the atmospheric regeneration apparatus from the final onslaught of hostile forces.
challenges: The player must strategically position defenses, recruit allies, and engage in intense combat to protect the regeneration process. They need to adapt to evolving enemy tactics.

enemies.name: Elite Faction Forces
enemies.description: The most powerful and well-equipped forces from the opposing factions, determined to destroy the regeneration apparatus.

enemies.name: Swarm Behemoth
enemies.description: A massive, amalgamated swarm creature that poses an immense threat to the player and their allies.

rewards.name: Earth's Savior
rewards.description: A prestigious title and recognition for the player's crucial role in saving Earth and its inhabitants.

rewards.name: Regeneration Masterkey
rewards.description: A powerful artifact that grants the player control over the atmospheric regeneration process and its maintenance.

name: Echoes of a New Dawn
objectives: With Earth's atmosphere regenerating, the player must navigate the aftermath and shape the future of the planet.
challenges: The player must make critical decisions that impact the rebuilding of society, balance competing interests, and address the lingering threats. They need to inspire hope and unity among the survivors.

enemies.name: Remnant Factions
enemies.description: Stubborn remnants of the opposing factions who refuse to accept the new reality and seek to undermine the player's efforts.

enemies.name: Corrupted Biomorphs
enemies.description: Biomorphs who have been tainted by the residual corruption and pose a danger to the fragile peace.

rewards.name: Legacy of the Founder
rewards.description: The player's actions and decisions are etched into history, shaping the future course of Earth and its inhabitants.

rewards.name: Interstellar Beacon
rewards.description: A powerful communication device that allows the player to establish contact with other survivors across the stars.
